title: Sticky marsala roast potatoes & parsnips with sage & lardons

ingredients.item: 300g pack Baby Parsnips, trimmed and halved
600g red skinned King Edward Potatoes, cut into wedges

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 220ÂºC, gas mark 7. In a large baking tray toss together the parsnips, potatoes, oil, sage, lardons and garlic. Season and roast for 35 minutes.
Add the marsala and mustard, toss well and roast for another 10 minutes until sticky and golden.
